GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v4.19.249
GSD.description:
irqchip/gic-v3: Fix refcount leak in gic_populate_ppi_partitions

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.249 by commit e824482e2c5edacc961b7dd30a92fd47606c3036, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit e3825ba1af3a27d7522c9f5f929f5a13b8b138ae. For more details please see the references link.
